mapper.insert: insert into gl_board (mbr_no, brd_title, brd_content, brd_type) values (#{mbrNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type})
mapper.update: update gl_board set brd_title = #{title}, brd_content = #{content}, chg_dt = now() where brd_no = #{brdNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo}
update gl_board set brd_view = brd_view + 1 where brd_no = #{brdNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gl_member_authority where mbr_no = #{userNo} and auth_no = 2
